name: Geojam topdown shooter
description:
I made this game for the 2022 GeoJam in three days. It is a geometric top-down shooter game where you can customize your bullets. Squares implode, Triangles explode, Circles bounce. Also enjoy the fun bugs :)

-Controls: X-open/close bullet menu, Click-shoot, WASD-move, Drag and drop to customize bullets

Fixed bug where had to press finished designing button 10 times before it works
